backend/main.mo: Simple Motoko actor exposing a hello() query that returns a greeting.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing deployment-fix work and listing affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining theme variables, dark mode overrides, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with layout and routes for all main pages.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with copyright text and links to disclaimer, privacy policy, and caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Layout component with header navigation, mobile sheet menu, main outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor depending on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind theme file defining OKLCH variables and Instagram gradient colors with utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/fakeProcessing.ts: Simulates a 60‑second delay and returns a random follower‑processing result.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application bootstrap wiring React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page describing the game, its mission, purpose, and safety reminders using multiple Cards.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page providing email addresses for inquiries, feedback, and help, plus a reminder that the game is a simulation.
frontend/src/pages/DisclaimerPage.tsx: Disclaimer page explaining that the site is a simulation, provides no real followers, collects no passwords, and outputs random results.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main game page allowing users to enter a username, select follower amounts, run a fake processing flow, and view a random result.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Explains the four steps of using the game and includes a note that results are random and for entertainment only.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Privacy policy page stating that no data is collected, stored, or shared and all logic runs client‑side with no external APIs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the Insta Follower Hook simulator, its features, architecture, issues, and versioned state.
